query:
SELECT a.id, a.name, a.programId, COUNT(ms.id) as sessionCount 
FROM alunos a 
LEFT JOIN mentoring_sessions ms ON ms.alunoId = a.id 
WHERE a.name LIKE '%Amaggeldo%' 
GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.programId
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kPX7CjhqdMFT8y.9c22f9f54902 --database 5n7arrGNHjNdoFCMzyGXcY --execute SELECT a.id, a.name, a.programId, COUNT(ms.id) as sessionCount 
FROM alunos a 
LEFT JOIN mentoring_sessions ms ON ms.alunoId = a.id 
WHERE a.name LIKE '%Amaggeldo%' 
GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.programId
